titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of August 15, 2023, as "Indian Independence Day: A National Day of Celebration of World's Two Largest Democracies".
Expressing support for the designation of August 15, 2023, as "Indian Independence Day: A National Day of Celebration of World's Two Largest Democracies".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses support for the designation of Indian Independence Day: A National Day of Celebration of World's Two Largest Democracies.
Further, the resolution acknowledges the contributions of Americans of Indian descent to society in the United States.
